comments.body:
I am currently seeing the following when trying to upgrade on Lucid from 3.0.x:

{code}
root@eucahost-51-73:~# apt-get dist-upgrade -s
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
Calculating upgrade... Done
The following NEW packages will be installed:
  bc defoma firefox-locale-en fontconfig gcj-4.4-base gcj-4.4-jre gcj-4.4-jre-headless gcj-4.4-jre-lib gcj-jre gcj-jre-headless hicolor-icon-theme libatk1.0-0 libatk1.0-data
  libcairo2 libcurl3 libdatrie1 libdirectfb-1.2-0 libfontenc1 libgcj-common libgcj10 libgcj10-awt libgtk2.0-0 libgtk2.0-bin libgtk2.0-common
  libhibernate-commons-annotations-java libice6 libjasper1 libjboss-common-java libpango1.0-0 libpango1.0-common libpixman-1-0 libpostgresql-jdbc-java libpq5 libsm6 libsysfs2
  libthai-data libthai0 libtiff4 libts-0.0-0 libxcb-render-util0 libxcb-render0 libxcomposite1 libxcursor1 libxdamage1 libxfixes3 libxfont1 libxft2 libxi6 libxinerama1
  libxrandr2 libxrender1 libxtst6 linux-headers-2.6.32-42 linux-headers-2.6.32-42-generic linux-image-2.6.32-42-generic postgresql-9.1 postgresql-client-9.1
  postgresql-client-common postgresql-common python-egenix-mxdatetime python-egenix-mxtools python-pygresql shared-mime-info tsconf ttf-dejavu-extra x-ttcidfont-conf x11-common
  xfonts-encodings xfonts-utils
The following packages will be upgraded:
  apparmor apparmor-utils apt apt-transport-https apt-utils aptitude base-files bind9-host bzip2 cron debhelper dnsutils eucalyptus-admin-tools eucalyptus-cc eucalyptus-cloud
  eucalyptus-common eucalyptus-gl eucalyptus-java-common eucalyptus-sc eucalyptus-walrus grub-common grub-pc initscripts insserv language-pack-en language-pack-en-base
  language-pack-gnome-en language-pack-gnome-en-base libapache2-mod-axis2c libapparmor-perl libapparmor1 libaxis2c0 libbind9-60 libbz2-1.0 libdns64 libexpat1 libfreetype6
  libgcrypt11 libgnutls26 libgssapi-krb5-2 libisc60 libisccc60 libisccfg60 libk5crypto3 libkrb5-3 libkrb5support0 libldap-2.4-2 liblwres60 libpam-modules libpam-runtime
  libpam0g libpng12-0 librampart0 libssl0.9.8 libtasn1-3 libxml2 linux-firmware linux-generic linux-headers-generic linux-image-generic openssl procps python-eucadmin sudo
  sysv-rc sysvinit-utils update-manager-core
